text: How Katie Holmes Got Into the Best Shape of Her Life Actress Katie Holmes is definitely not Joey Potter anymore. Not only is she wearing a stylish new pixie cut, but she's also sporting some serious biceps. The ` ` Dawson's Creek'' alum underwent some intense training for an upcoming role in which she plays an ex - Marine. According to her recent interview with Women's Health, Holmes is ` ` a startling combination of litheness and sinew.'' So just how did the actress get into such tip - top shape? We break down the star's tough - yet - doable new workout.
